The algorithms were trained using a leave-one-out cross-validation method, where each sample was left out and the algorithm was trained on the remaining samples. This process was repeated for all samples to ensure robustness in the classification.

The performance of the algorithms was evaluated based on their overall accuracy in classifying the seeds. The algorithms with higher overall accuracy were selected for further validation.
